page.title: 17Law,Population,Landscape
page.content: {LAW & ORDER. There is a community policeman who serves the area.P.C Ellis patrols Maidencombe once a week on foot.Few crimes are commited but in the summer when the holiday makers come down the rate rises.P.C Ellis is based at Torquay. {POPULATION.} The people are middle and upper middle class.There are most elderly people in Maidencombe.There are more deaths than births. {LANDSCAPE.} In Maidencombe there is a sandy beach with large boulders.There are high cliffs made of clay and sandstone .The sea has eroded the bottom of the cliffs which are sheer.There are steep hills and valleys.The clay soil is a reddish colour.It is good for gardening and farming.
